title: Mouse3 Mouse 4 not available for use in game
body: ive always put my summoner spells on my mouse side buttons, but the game simply wont detect them anymore, is there a way i can solve this? this is hindering my gameplay and i can only bind the summoners to my keyboard.

replies.body: This has been a recurring issue for players who have updated to the Creator Update on Windows 10.  Your best bet may be to rollback your update, or hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so see if we can find any options.  Sorry!
